verses.verse: I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>"Smite<s%> the <S%H3730>capitals<s%> so that the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> will <S%H7493>shake,<s%> And <S%H1214>break<s%> them on the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them <S%H3605>all!<s%> Then I will <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H319>rest<s%> of them with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> They will not have a <S%H5127>fugitive<s%> who will <S%H5127>flee,<s%> Or a <S%H6412>refugee<s%> who will <S%H4422>escape.<s%>

<S%H518>"Though<s%> they <S%H2864>dig<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> From <S%H8033>there<s%> shall My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> them; And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H5927>ascend<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> From <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down.<s%>

"And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H2244>hide<s%> on the <S%H7218>summit<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> I will <S%H2664>search<s%> them out and <S%H3947>take<s%> them from <S%H8033>there;<s%> And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H5641>conceal<s%> themselves from My <S%H5869>sight<s%> on the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> From <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> and it will <S%H5391>bite<s%> them.

"And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H340>enemies,<s%> From <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> that it <S%H2026>slay<s%> them, And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them for <S%H9567>evil<s%> and not for <S%H9186>good.<s%>"

And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> The One who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> so that it <S%H4127>melts,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it <S%H56>mourn,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> of it <S%H5927>rises<s%> up like the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> And <S%H8257>subsides<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

The One who <S%H1129>builds<s%> His <S%H4609>upper<s%> <S%H4609>chambers<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And has <S%H3245>founded<s%> His <S%H92>vaulted<s%> <S%H92>dome<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> He who <S%H7121>calls<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> And <S%H8210>pours<s%> them out on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"Are you not as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3569>Ethiopia<s%> to Me, O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "Have I not <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H3731>Caphtor<s%> and the <S%H758>Arameans<s%> from <S%H9518>Kir<s%>?

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> are on the <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> And I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth;<s%> <S%H657>Nevertheless,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H8045>totally<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding,<s%> And I will <S%H5128>shake<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> As [grain] is <S%H5128>shaken<s%> in a <S%H3531>sieve,<s%> But not a <S%H9501>kernel<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> Those who <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H9567>calamity<s%> will not <S%H5066>overtake<s%> or <S%H6923>confront<s%> us.'

"In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5521>booth<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> And <S%H1443>wall<s%> up its <S%H6556>breaches;<s%> I will also <S%H6965>raise<s%> up its <S%H2034>ruins,<s%> And <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> it as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old;<s%>

That they may <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by My <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H5002>"Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "When the <S%H9177>plowman<s%> will <S%H5066>overtake<s%> the <S%H7114>reaper<s%> And the <S%H1869>treader<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> him who <S%H4900>sows<s%> <S%H2233>seed;<s%> When the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will <S%H5197>drip<s%> <S%H6071>sweet<s%> <S%H6071>wine,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> will be <S%H4127>dissolved.<s%>

"Also I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> And they will <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H8074>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> [in them], They will also <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H3196>wine,<s%> And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

"I will also <S%H5193>plant<s%> them on their <S%H127>land,<s%> And they will not <S%H5750>again<s%> be <S%H5428>rooted<s%> out from their <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them," <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
